Name: Description
Infant Mortality by Race: Deaths of infants under 1 year per 1,000 live births by maternal race/ethnicity.

Name: Source Notes
Infant Mortality by Race: New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, Bureau of Vital Statistics, Summary of Vital Statistics (2000-2017); retrieved from https://www1.nyc.gov/site/doh/data/vital-statistics/vital-statistics-summary.page

Name: Notes
Infant Mortality by Race: The IMR for Hispanic babies is calculated by CCC by combining Vital Statistics data for Puerto Rican and Other Hispanic respondents.
